0: Under Katya Radchenko’s leadership, the people of Otradnoye have finally felt some hope for a brighter future
7.287565: This hope never did become reality
9.859647: After the death of Dan, his gang, that formerly protected Otradnoye, scattered all over the Wastes, and the village was quickly raised by marauding raiders
20.57665: The survivors told people that Katya died in the raid, back to back with her brother, all the while trying to protect her home with weapon in hand
